sentences.sContent: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.sContent_eng: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.sCn: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

sentences.sContent: If you like fish but hate the smell, soak your fish in water and baking soda for an hour in the  fridge.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you like fish but hate the smell, soak your fish in water and baking soda for an hour in the fridge.
sentences.sCn: 如果你爱吃鱼但又不喜欢那惺味的话，不妨将鱼浸泡在小苏打水里然后在冰箱里放上一小时。

sentences.sContent: Because of this, he says, children learning English "need someone to show them the letters, teach them the letter sounds, play with letter magnets on the fridge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of this, he says, children learning English "need someone to show them the letters, teach them the letter sounds, play with letter magnets on the fridge.
sentences.sCn: 因此，他说，儿童学习英语“需要有人给他们看这些字母，教他们字母的读音，与他们玩贴在冰箱上的磁铁字母。”

trans.tranOther: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, used for keeping food and drinks cool
